name: Rear of Business
description: The only aim in ROB is to survive - Overcome struggles such as poverty, shelter and business. Protect yourself from other rich. Become an ace chemist, an aspiring engineer and a successful manager at the same time. Design your very own business and manage your workers.  is the first-person shooter franchise developed by the renowned 2xDal game studio. Many offices, workshops and workplaces can be purchased in the game. you can craft and sell your own items. live your dream life
